notes: Cronje run out trying for 3rd run. Sent back by Kallis and run out by Thorpe's throw from the boundary.
8th wicket partnership is record for SA in ODI's.

milestones.description: Matthews and Shaun Pollock's 59-run partnership is SA's highest for the 8th wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 44 between Richardson and McMillan
